info.title: API to manage transactions
info.description: This API expose transaction management endpoints.

get.description: Get a Transaction Data object by specifying its id. The response is Transaction Data object with id, title, description and published status.

get.summary: Retrieve all Transaction information of the user

initialCredit.description: Total no of valid transaction that the transaction is bearing
Total no of valid transaction that the transaction is bearing
